sections.heading: Overview
sections.content: Sports at Raghubir Singh Junior Modern School are an integral part of the curriculum, designed to nurture physical fitness, discipline, teamwork, and sportsmanship. The school believes that athletics and movement are vital for a child’s all-round development and well-being.

sections.heading: Badminton
sections.content: Interested students receive training from experienced coaches who focus on refining their techniques and building game strategy. Regular inter-house matches instill a healthy competitive spirit, while outstanding performers are selected to represent RSJMS in inter-school tournaments.

sections.heading: Gymnastics
sections.content: Gymnastics training at RSJMS develops balance, coordination, agility, flexibility, and strength. Under expert supervision, students practice regularly in a well-equipped gymnasium. Sessions emphasize confidence, teamwork, and mental focus alongside physical endurance.

sections.heading: Athletics
sections.content: The athletics programme focuses on developing stamina, technique, and confidence. Coaches guide students through structured routines in running, jumping, and other field activities. The school’s athletic track, made of polyurethane and rubber composite, ensures safety and comfort during training and competitions.

sections.heading: Chess
sections.content: Chess is introduced at an early age to develop concentration, critical thinking, and foresight. Students are encouraged to participate in inter-school and zonal tournaments. The chess programme has brought numerous accolades to RSJMS and continues to be a source of pride and intellectual engagement.
